items.title: Build Community
items.description: Connect with like-minded individuals committed to social and economic justice. Develop relationships with fellow organizers and build solidarity across movements.

items.title: Learn and Grow
items.description: Participate in political education and skill-building workshops. Develop your organizing skills and deepen your understanding of socialist politics and strategy.

items.title: Take Action
items.description: Join campaigns for Medicare for All, Green New Deal, housing justice, and labor organizing. Make a tangible difference in the lives of working people in Delaware.
